com.blockhaus2000.plugin

Interface IpmPluginLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleIpmPluginLoader

    public interface IpmPluginLoader
    The plugin loader is used to load IpmPlugins.
    Author:
    Blockhaus2000

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Class<?> getClassByName(java.lang.String className)
      Searchs for a (full-qualified) class name in all IpmPluginClassLoader from all plugins.
      IpmPlugin load(java.io.File file)
      Loads and returns an instance of the IpmPlugin that is represented by the given File.
      IpmPlugin load(java.lang.String pluginName)
      Will call load(File) with file as a new File with the path to the plugin-jar (the suffix .jar will be added automaticly).
      java.util.Set<IpmPlugin> loadAll()
      Loads all plugins (represented by jar files) in the plugins folder in the data folder of the root plugin (the InternalPluginManager).

    • Method Detail

      • load

        IpmPlugin load(java.io.File file)
               throws PluginException
        Loads and returns an instance of the IpmPlugin that is represented by the given File.

        NOTE: Has to contains a plugin.yml if the root folder.

        Parameters:
        file - The File that contains the IpmPlugin.
        Returns:
        An instance of the IpmPlugin that is represented by the File.
        Throws:
        PluginException - If an error occurred (for example, if no plugin.yml can be found).

      • load

        IpmPlugin load(java.lang.String pluginName)
               throws PluginException
        Will call load(File) with file as a new File with the path to the plugin-jar (the suffix .jar will be added automaticly).
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the jar file to load.
        Returns:
        The return of load(File).
        Throws:
        PluginException - Will be thrown if load(File) throws it.
        See Also:
        load(java.io.File)

      • loadAll

        java.util.Set<IpmPlugin> loadAll()
                                 throws PluginException
        Loads all plugins (represented by jar files) in the plugins folder in the data folder of the root plugin (the InternalPluginManager). Will call load(File) with all jar file that was found.
        Returns:
        A Set of instances IpmPlugins that are represented by the jar files in the plugins folder.
        Throws:
        PluginException - Will be thrown if load(File) throws it.
        See Also:
        load(java.io.File)

      • getClassByName

        java.lang.Class<?> getClassByName(java.lang.String className)
        Searchs for a (full-qualified) class name in all IpmPluginClassLoader from all plugins.
        Parameters:
        className - The full-qualified class name to search for.
        Returns:
        The class that was found. If nothing was found, this returns null.
